Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 4th overall pick, by Malibu in 1973...
Had first career hit on 8/16/1973, off John Levan (CBC)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/7/1973, off Adam Hauge (TOL)...
Injured on 5/21/1974 with a Inflamed Hamstring Muscle, out for 3-4 weeks...
Had 20-game hitting streak snapped on 5/4/1976...
Injured on 5/10/1976 with a Jammed Finger, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had 22-game hitting streak snapped on 5/2/1977...
Injured on 7/9/1977 with a Inflamed Abdominal Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by West Texas on 2/14/1986 to a 3-year deal worth $2,830,000 per year...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Pontiac on 4/21/1986...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/28/1986, hitting .652 with 1 HR, 11 RBI...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
Had 2000th career hit on 8/24/1986, off Silvio Barettes (TRO)...
Drove in 7 runs against Diablo on 9/26/1987...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/29/1987, hitting .478 with 3 HR, 16 RBI...
